q: company needed a more mature leader. "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," Eric Schmidt said ina statement. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. NFL vice president Brian McCarthy said Michael Vick has been diligent in tending to community-relations commitments as part of commissioner Roger Goodell 's program of rehabilitation for him following his incarceration for federal dogfighting offenses. He's done a great job turning things around, Brian McCarthy said. "He still meets regularly with the commissioner and fulfills his obligations." Michael Vick also continues to have conversations with former Colts coach Tony Dungy , who was assigned to mentor him.

The lawmakers continued to joke about what they were going to do together, and as they did so, Gabrielle Giffords started to open her eyes, literally, Kirsten Gillibrand said. . Donald Rumsfeld said "it's possible" that decisions on troop levels in Iraq may have been the biggest mistake of the war. He maintained that the war overall was not a mistake. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said. Donald Rumsfeld was also critical of Colin Powell 's successor, Condoleezza Rice , for her lack of experience in government. "She'd never served in a George H.W. Mr. Bauer Mike Pence says he plans to announce his decision early next year. I'd put money on him running for governor over president, because the field is a lot smaller and he wouldn't be running against an incumbent, says Indiana's recently retired GOP chairman, Murray Clark .
